-2: You are stronger than you think; the storm will pass.

Even in darkness, a spark of hope can shine bright.

Sometimes the bravest thing you can do is ask for help.
The darkest nights produce the brightest stars.
Your struggles are part of your strength, not your identity.

When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot and hang on.
The wound is the place where the light enters you.
What doesn't kill you makes you stronger.
Sometimes you need to fall before you fly.
Even the darkest hour only has 60 minutes.

Sometimes it takes darkness to see the stars.

The darker the night, the brighter the stars.

The night is darkest just before the dawn.
-1: Pain is temporary, brighter days lie ahead.
